title: Birthday Vacation Advice
description:
Jalen and Jacoby break down the top 2-0 teams, tier out the Chiefs, Bucs, Bills, Eagles, Dolphins and Giants, and take a deeper look at Tom Brady's admission that he needs to control his emotions. Plus! The Celtics honor the Bill Russell, Aaron Judge is making history (if not the history a certain faction of fans WANT to pretend he's making) and Drake has a jimmy! But the real star of today's show is a caller who had his heart broken right before a birthday trip they booked together -- and the advice from Jalen Rose, which includes a quote we may be using for a long, long time. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
